疻字的基本解释

疻
zhǐ
因殴打而形成的皮肤青肿的伤。

疻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǐ］
［《廣韻》章移切，平支，章。］
［《廣韻》旨夷切，平脂，章。］
［《集韻》掌氏切，上紙，章。］
(1)殴人致皮肤肿起无创痕者为“疻”。泛指殴伤。
(2)泛指疾病。

疻字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　疻； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页771第13
【唐韻】【正韻】諸氏切【集韻】【韻會】掌氏切，?音紙。【說文】毆傷也。【前漢·薛宣傳】遇人不以義而見疻者，與痏人之罪均，惡不直也。【注】應劭曰：以杖手擊人，剝其皮膚腫，起靑黑而無創瘢者，律謂疻痏。　又【廣韻】旨夷切【集韻】蒸夷切，?音脂。又【集韻】商支切，音施。又章移切，音支。又【類篇】敞尒切，音侈。義?同。

疻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
疻字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
疻
zhǐ
Bruises on the skin caused by beatings.
疻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǐ］
["Guangyun" chapter shift cut, flat branch, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" aims to cut, level fat, and chapter. ]
["Ji Yun" Zhang Shi cut, put on paper, chapter. ]
(1) The skin swelling and no wounds caused by assaults are called "brunches." Refers to assaults in general.
(2) Refers to disease in general.

[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　疻; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 771 13
【Tang Yun】【Zheng Yun】Zhu Shi cut 【Ji Yun】【Yun Hui】Zhang Shi cut, sound paper. [Said the text] Assaulted. [Previous Han·Xue Propaganda] People who meet people who don’t just see the gangster are the same as the gangster’s sins, and the evil is not straight. [Note] Ying Shao said: If you hit a person with a stick, peel off the skin and swell your skin, it will be black and non-invasive.　[Guangyun] The purpose is to cut [Jiyun] to steam and cut,? Sound fat. Also 【Jiyun】Shangzhi cut, Yin Shi. Also chapter shift cut, sound support. Also 【Classes】Open and cut, the sound is extravagant. Righteous? Same.

ссадина, кровоподтёк, синяк (от побоев); побои; в ссадинах, в синяках
